verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Moreover <S%H559><s%>, thou shalt say to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H376>Whosoever<s%> he be of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, or of the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> that <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that <S%H5414>giveth<s%> of his <S%H2233>seed<s%> unto <S%H4432>Molech<s%>; he shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>: the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H7275>stone<s%> him with <S%H7275>stones<s%>.

I also will <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> against that <S%H376>man<s%>, and will cut him <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>; because he hath <S%H5414>given<s%> of his <S%H2233>seed<s%> unto <S%H4432>Molech<s%>, to <S%H2930>defile<s%> my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>, and to <S%H2490>profane<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>.

And if the <S%H5971>people<s%> at the <S%H776>land<s%> do at <S%H5956>all<s%> <S%H5956>hide<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from that <S%H376>man<s%>, when he <S%H5414>giveth<s%> of his <S%H2233>seed<s%> unto <S%H4432>Molech<s%>, and put him <S%H1115>not<s%> to <S%H4191>death<s%>;

then I will <S%H7760>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> against that <S%H376>man<s%>, and against his <S%H4940>family<s%>, and will cut him <S%H3772>off<s%>, and all that play the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H2181>him<s%>, to play the harlot with <S%H4432>Molech<s%>, from <S%H7130>among<s%> their <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And the <S%H5315>soul<s%> that <S%H6437>turneth<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them that have familiar <S%H178>spirits<s%>, and <S%H310>unto<s%> the <S%H3049>wizards<s%>, to play the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5414>them<s%>, I will even set my <S%H6440>face<s%> against that <S%H5315>soul<s%>, and will cut him <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>.
Sanctify <S%H6942><s%> yourselves <S%H6918>therefore<s%>, and be ye holy; for I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.
And ye shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3068>them<s%>: I am Jehovah who sanctifieth <S%H6942>you<s%>.

For <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> that <S%H7043>curseth<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> or his <S%H517>mother<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>: he hath <S%H7043>cursed<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> or his <S%H517>mother<s%>; his blood shall be upon <S%H1818>him<s%>.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> that committeth <S%H5003>adultery<s%> with another <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>, even he that committeth <S%H5003>adultery<s%> with his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>, the <S%H5003>adulterer<s%> and the <S%H5003>adulteress<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H7901>lieth<s%> with his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%> hath <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>: <S%H8147>both<s%> of them shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>; their blood shall be upon <S%H1818>them<s%>.

And if a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7901>lie<s%> with his <S%H3618>daughter-in<s%>-law, <S%H8147>both<s%> of them shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>: they have <S%H6213>wrought<s%> <S%H8397>confusion<s%>; their blood shall be upon <S%H1818>them<s%>.

And if a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7901>lie<s%> with <S%H2145>mankind<s%>, as <S%H4904>with<s%> <S%H802>womankind<s%>, <S%H8147>both<s%> of them have <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H8441>abomination<s%>: they shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>; their blood shall be upon <S%H1818>them<s%>.

And if a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> and her <S%H517>mother<s%>, it is <S%H2154>wickedness<s%>: they shall be <S%H8313>burnt<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>, both he and <S%H2154>they<s%>; that there be no wickedness among <S%H8432>you<s%>.
And if a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5414>lie<s%> with a <S%H929>beast<s%>, he shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>: and ye shall <S%H2026>slay<s%> the <S%H929>beast<s%>.

And if a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H7126>approach<s%> unto any <S%H929>beast<s%>, and lie <S%H7250>down<s%> <S%H2026>thereto<s%>, thou shalt kill the <S%H802>woman<s%>, and the <S%H929>beast<s%>: they shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>; their blood shall be upon <S%H1818>them<s%>.

And if a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> his <S%H269>sister<s%>, his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, <S%H176>or<s%> his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>, and she <S%H7200>see<s%> his <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>; it is a shameful <S%H2617>thing<s%>; and they shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the children of their <S%H5971>people<s%>: he hath <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his <S%H269>sister<s%>'s <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>; he shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.

And if a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> with a <S%H802>woman<s%> having her <S%H1739>sickness<s%>, and shall <S%H1540>uncover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>; he hath made <S%H6168>naked<s%> her <S%H4726>fountain<s%>, and she hath <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> the <S%H4726>fountain<s%> of her <S%H1818>blood<s%>: and <S%H8147>both<s%> of them shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> their <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And thou shalt not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of thy <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H269>sister<s%>, nor of thy <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H269>sister<s%>; for he hath made <S%H6168>naked<s%> his near <S%H7607>kin<s%>: they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.

And if a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> with his <S%H1733>uncle<s%>'s wife, he hath <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his <S%H1730>uncle<s%>'s <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>: they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H2399>sin<s%>; they shall <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H6185>childless<s%>.

And if a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>, it is <S%H5079>impurity<s%>: he hath <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>; they shall be <S%H6185>childless<s%>.

Ye shall therefore <S%H8104>keep<s%> all my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and all mine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H776>them<s%>; that the land, whither I <S%H935>bring<s%> you to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H6958>therein<s%>, vomit you not out.

And ye shall not <S%H3212>walk<s%> in the <S%H2708>customs<s%> of the <S%H1471>nation<s%>, which I cast <S%H7971>out<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6213>you<s%>: for they did all these <S%H6973>things<s%>, and therefore I abhorred them.

But I have <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3423>you<s%>, Ye shall inherit their <S%H127>land<s%>, and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it unto you to <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H776>it<s%>, a land <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>: I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, who hath <S%H914>separated<s%> you from the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>.

Ye shall therefore make a <S%H914>distinction<s%> between the <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H929>beast<s%> and the <S%H2931>unclean<s%>, and between the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H5775>fowl<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean<s%>: and ye shall not make your <S%H5315>souls<s%> <S%H8262>abominable<s%> by <S%H929>beast<s%>, or by <S%H5775>bird<s%>, or by anything <S%H7430>wherewith<s%> the <S%H127>ground<s%> <S%H914>teemeth<s%>, which I have separated from you as <S%H2930>unclean<s%>.
And ye shall be <S%H6918>holy<s%> unto <S%H3068>me<s%>: for I, Jehovah, am <S%H6918>holy<s%>, and have <S%H914>set<s%> you apart from the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>, that ye should be mine.

A <S%H376>man<s%> also or a <S%H802>woman<s%> that <S%H3588>hath<s%> a familiar <S%H178>spirit<s%>, or that is a <S%H3049>wizard<s%>, shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>: they shall <S%H7275>stone<s%> them with <S%H7275>stones<s%>; their blood shall be upon <S%H1818>them<s%>.
